alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bolivar County through 415 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Gunnison, or 11 miles south of White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gunnison around 340 PM CDT. Deeson around 350 PM CDT. Shelby around 405 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Winstonville, Duncan and Alligator. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
